---
title: "A teaching concept about replicable data analysis now published!"
date: 2024-04-23
subtitle: "by OSC members Max Mandl, Sabine Hoffmann, and Anne-Laure Boulesteix"
---

NA

<p>OSC members <a href="../../members/individual_members/lmu-members/boulesteix/index.html" title="Boulesteix">Anne-Laure Boulesteix</a>, <a href="../../members/individual_members/fellows/mandl1/index.html" title="Mandl">Max Mandl</a> and <a href="../../members/individual_members/lmu-members/hoffmann/index.html" title="Hoffmann">Sabine Hoffmann</a> are authors of the paper <strong>"Raising awareness of uncertain choices in empirical data analysis: A teaching concept toward replicable research practices"</strong> (<a href="https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pcbi.1011936">https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pcbi.1011936</a>) published in PLOS Computational Biology. The education paper presents a teaching concept to help students to recognize the impact of their analytical choices and to learn strategies to handle these choices transparently.</p>
<p>Their work has party been funded by an individual DFG project.</p>
